credits:
Produced by : Lipta

deungdutjaisNote: I LOVE Lipta, but I feel like this song was just a half-*ssed attempt to rehash their success of their single ‡πÄ‡πÄ‡∏ü‡∏ô / Faen (Girlfriend) with a very similar melody, simple lyrics, lots of repetition, and throwing in a rap verse to feature Lazyloxy, who has been in way too many songs lately. At least this song is still, like, giving the girl a choice, I guess; ‚ÄúIt would be nice if it could be you‚Ä¶‚Äù or ‚ÄúWe can date whenever you‚Äôre ready..‚Äù. I do like Lipta a lot because their lyrics are so passive and non-pressuring like that. But as for this particular release? Really not that impressive for me.
